content.detailedDescription: It was a saturday evening, we were headed to our friends house for a dinner party. i was sitting in the rear passenger side of the small nissan with my infant daughter in the middle, and my wife was driving. as we headed northwest bound on river rd. towards the second bend after dodge blvd. i was gazing towards the late evening sunset from the backseat. from the top of the side window i saw a white glowing object resembling falling meteorite or shooting star. it fell rapidly at an angle & then abruptly shot forward(in the same direction we were heading) in a straight line and disappeared. i said "what the heck was that?!". my wife responded "i'm glad i'm not the only one who saw that!" we were quite shaken and when we told our friends they believed us but did not encourage us to report it.
content.summary: While driving to a friend's house, my wife and i witnesses a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Two friends and myself were night fishing in the center of manasquan inlet, nj which separates point pleasant beach from manasquan, about 200 yards from the inlet opening to the atlantic ocean. this is a familiar location i have known for over 50 years. friend #1 first noticed an unusual star-like intermittent (not steadily blinking) white light making unusually fast and erratic movements and seemingly impossible instantaneous stops and changes of direction, and pointed it out to me and friend #2. 

it was a clear, cloudless night with a full moon, and the light, relative to our position inside manasquan inlet, appeared to be directly above a lighted red flashing buoy one mile approximately southeast of the mouth of the inlet, at an approximate apparent altitude of 5,000 feet or about 30 degrees above the eastern horizon, an area of high volume air traffic in and out of new york city area airports newark, kennedy and laguardia, as well as east-west flight paths of military flights in and out of nearby mcguire air force base and lakehurst naval air station. with no reference points, the distance from us to the object is estimated to be at least 5 miles away, but could well have been much farther. i have copied a link from earthnc to show our exact position:
http://earthnc.Com/chartviewer/?Ll=40.10052853354975,-74.0227460861206&z=15&chart=onechart

when the three of us took note of the object, we at first thought it might be coast guard or navy helicopters which regularly frequent the area, but those are easily distinguishable by their navigation and steadily flashing strobe lights. the object appeared to display a single steady white light for about 10 to 20 seconds at a time, during which period it made numerous almost instantaneous position changes vertically, horizontally and diagonally within a defined area, then would extinguish, only to reappear and perform a similar but random series of movements. i am aware of no aircraft with this capability. 

the three of us watched these maneuvers intently and with great curiosity and amazement for several minutes. the intermittently lighted objects would appear smaller than a pea held at arms length, and we observed no other air traffic during this sighting.

it was difficult to determine initially if the movements were that of a single object or more, but after about a minute of us all watching the movements of the object with great interest, a second object appeared simultaneously nearby, and displayed similar behavior to the first object. after that the objects appeared both singly and together in individual random maneuvers which made them appear to move thousands of feet at a time in just a second or fraction of a second, and in many directions with abrupt stops and zig-zag direction changes, almost as if playing a combined game of tag and hide-and-seek. 

we observed these objects for about 15 minutes until they were no longer visible as we headed northwest up the manasquan river back to bay head. also, the movements of the objects were all straight line movements as opposed to curving as a typical aircraft might do.

being a life-long boater and professional yacht delivery captain, and being familiar with air traffic in this area and having lived here for over 50 years, i feel i have good observation abilities but remain at a loss as to what these objects might have been, and my two friends agree they could not determine what these objects were.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 intermittent white lights made individual very fast random movements.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were leaving the movies and saw a very big bright light in the sky. it looked like a star but was much brighter and larger than any other star in the sky. about ten minutes later we arrived back at his house and went over his neighbors house to sit on the front porch. our friends were also watching the light wondering what it was when we got there. it was about thirty minutes later that the light slowly started to go lower. as it went lower it would also become less bright and smaller. as the object was just above the tree line it started letting off small orbs of lights that lit up the top of the trees. then out of no where the object disappeared without a trace.
content.summary: Extremely bright light high in the sky that slowly lowered itself letting off orbs of lights and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an amature photographer for a local news station. 
i generally take photos of weather related things & nature related things. 
as i was taking photos of this evenings beautiful sunset i caught through my lens a regular airline flying through the clouds leaving a vapor trail behind it and i thought it would make a nice shot. 
it was only after i uploaded it from my camera to my pc and then to the news website that i realized there was something odd in the photo. 
prior to placing the photo on the news website i cropped the photo just so i could see more clear the plane leaving the vapor trail through the clouds etc etc.. 
only after i uploaded it to the news site i realized something odd. 

just above the plane and vapor trail and to the left of the plane and vapor trail is a small white sphere or circle. 
initially i thought " wow, is that a bird or what?".. 
so i grabbed the original un-enhanced or(un-cropped) photo and tried to zoom in on it. 
i have been to this site before telling some pretty awesome stories of things that have happened in my area ( this tiny little city ) that my son's and myself have seen in the night sky.And one of your guys contacted me through email and wanted to speek with me over the phone. i declined the offer because i was afraid that the goverment might get downwind of it and hunt me down.I'de laugh usually if i didnt think that was so serious. but i do feel it is serious * so i keep my mouth shut about it all unless it's family.*
 i am not sure what this thing is i captured. nor did i even see it untill i downloaded it to the news site. 
and then i felt like an idiot for not noticing it prior to uploading it to the news site. 
it was still quite daylight out. the object is clearly as white as the plane and the vapor trail the plane was leaving behind. 
i tried to zoom in on it only to make it pixelate & worse off. i'm not sure what you guys might be able to do with the photo. i am handing you folks a copy to see what you think about it.
~sincerely, [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Taking photos of sunset captured a shot of a plane flying through with vapor trail seen circle or sphere after uploading to my pc.

content.detailedDescription:
There were blue, green and white lights, they kept moving around and seemed to follow him a bit till he got to the next town, plan on being in the area tomorrow night.  i went out from my home and could see some lights moving that are not starts since i have lived in my home and know what stars are supposed to be where and we also know what flies in the skies in our area, life copters and all of that.

this was seen by my oldest son who is now a believer, he called me a bit excited about what he saw and he is 18 and knows when "something" is different and would not call me about ufo's for no reason or even as a joke.

i must say i am jealous!!!
content.summary: Several circles changes places.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to look for my keys (that i had temporarily lost), and as usual, i glanced up into the sky. i noticed an orangey-yellow glowing object in the sky almost directly above me. it was cigar or cylinder shaped and flew without any sound. its flight was very smooth, as if it were set on a particular course and it seemed to also increase in elevation as it headed toward the horizon. it flew from west to east. it did not have any blinking lights, wings, or trail, and it made no noise what so ever. i am not near any traffic, and no cars were running in the parking lot, so i do not think it possible that noise could have been drowned out.
content.summary: Orangey-yellow glowing cigar-shaped object flying.

content.detailedDescription:
It looked like it was coming in my direction, there were neighbors looking up at it as well.  it looked like it could have been something on fire, but, it was not coming in a downward direction.  i grabbed a small pair of binoculers and i could see a large orange shape with a short (about one and a half times the shape) tail also bright orange like fire.

i noticed it seemed to stop moving, then began going in the other direction but more like a v pattern.  it was certainly too bright to be an airplane, and did not continue its course to be a meteor.
content.summary: A large orange object with an orange tail, traveling slowly toward me, then began going the other way. looked like a meteor, but it changed directions.

content.detailedDescription: I waled out front off my house with one off my sons friends to smoke,no sooner than we got out there i looked up in the sky and there it was coming across the sky on a level flight path.At first i thought it was a plane so i said to him look at the ufo joking and he looked.He had his camera phone and tried to get a picture but it would not pick it up but it could pick up the stars.We continued to watch it as it went across the sky to see if you could see any blinking lights as it went by but it did not.Also there was a plane coming towards it at the same time.As we continued to watch this it kept the same brightness the whole time,it did not have any kind off tail to it so i am pretty sure it was no comet or meteor and it was only flying maybe about 100 feet above telephone poles.The planes were higher than this thing and moving a whole lot faster then the planes were.We watched this thing until we could no longer see it.I watch stuff on ufo`s all the time and i never thought that i would ever see one i always hoped that i would but you just never know.The papers were calling it a fireball what i saw was no fireball it had no tail.
content.summary: Had level flying  and other planes in area.

content.detailedDescription:
Was wondering if you have any reports like this one that i will tell you about.  my wife and i were just north of washington, iowa driving south at night when my wife noticed a light to left in the sky flying at a low altitude. clear night about 8 pm and moving fast. the only light we did see was a white strobe light going back and forth on the back of the craft. it reminded us of the show that had the car kit, i think, with the red light going back and forth. this light appeared to be on the back, but who knows as it was dark. i guess it to be about 50 feet wide for the light going back and forth from one side to the other. it was headed southeast. could not really make out any shape but we did not hear any sound as of a jet or small plane as it flew over us. we were going to put the date down but forgot to do it. it was last fall when this happened.
 
[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Witness and wife were traveling in car and saw an unidentifiable light cross diagonally from left to right in front of them.

content.detailedDescription:
Personal information shared in this sighting report ok to share with the public.

last wednesday, 6-23-10, i was skywatching and i had a pretty significant sighting and i shared it with [cms/tg/pid] and [cms/tg/pid]. at first i thought i was watching the iss fly over, but several things convinced me that what i was seeing was not the iss........

there were many times in years past that i took my youngest son out to watch the iss/shuttle connected and flying overhead. i know very well from these past times how bright they were, how fast they flew over, etc........ 

the iss did fly over my area this night and its track was sw to ene........The degree coming and going were both 17 degrees above the horizon with a max elevation of 61 degrees. the duration was for 4 minutes for the iss. the sighting duration time began at 9:45 pm........

the object i saw flew sw to ne........About 35 degrees coming and about 60 degrees going.......The max elevation was 80 degrees......Damn near straight over my head........From my vantage point on my drive way there would be no way for me to see the iss at 17 degrees either coming or going.......And remember my home is located on a hill overlooking a valley and the max elevation of my object was 19 degrees higher than what the iss was flying.........

i first spotted the object at a long distance in the sw at about 35 degrees, between the moon and the top of trees from my vantage point. it brightness was brighter than the moon, no clouds in the sky......Its size was about two times brighter than jupiter at it biggest in the winter sky..........

the object stayed the exact same brightness and size during the entire sighting time.......Between 1 to 1 1/2 minutes...........Unlike sat\'s. or iss/shuttle, there was no gradual buildup to full brightness and then a gradual ease to disappearance........My 1 to 1/2 minute sighting time was in direct contradiction to the 4 minute fly by duration time of the iss.....9:45 pm to 9:49 pm.....My sighting time was 9:48/49 pm to 9:51 pm........The shorter time span of my sighting meant that what i saw was traveling much faster than the iss, and began near the end of the iss sighting time duration, which would have meant that when i first saw my object far in the sw sky, the iss would have already been nearly out of view in the ene sky........

i had my binoculars with me and watched the object the entire time through them except for about 5 seconds as i raised the binoculars up to my eyes. i had already earlier in the night set my focus/vision.......

these binoculars have a button to press and hold down for image stabilization (cannon 10 x 30) similar to a video camera. the is on this set of binoculars stills the image so there is no blurring or shaking effect when looking at an object at distance, and maintains the still effect as an object moves in real time as long as the is button is pressed down.....

when i pressed the is button and held it down i could very clearly see that the object was not just a bright, white light in the sky, but was a structured object different than the iss. the bottom part of the object was elongated like a hot dog or hot dog bun, and had a rounded, dome structure on top, dead center. i could see the outline of this object during the entire sighting time. from my perspective the object had a typical saucer shape to it.

note: every single time in the past while taking my so to watch iss/shuttle fly overs, nasa tracking times over areas were perfect.......If nasa said say 7:22 pm, then my cell phone which uses sat. time said 7:22 pm when we first spotted the fly overs.

last year i reported that the ufo\'s were mimicking stars, planets, iss, shuttle on fly overs in my area. linda moulton howe reported this same thing on coast to coast am in 2009. these objects/crafts have been flying over this area on a regular basis for nearly two years now. i believe that the object i witnessed was doing the same, and trailing/following the iss along its same flight path as to not raise any suspicions.

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Extrememly bright, white light when seen through is binoculars had structure.

content.detailedDescription:
The following description is being reported by *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)an iowa field investigator for mufon.  

on saturday, may 1,2010 between 8:30 and 9:00 in the evening,a witness while walking his dog, reported one of his many sitings that have taken place in the skies over rockwell collins.  a star-like object, flying from the northwest to the southeast, went into a slow/curved flight path to the northeast. at the same time, one passenger jet flew west near the flight path and a second passenger jet flying northease flew directly over the moving object. the star-like object was estimated to be between 10-15,000 feet while the passenger jets were estimated at 30,000.

on thursday, may 6, 2010 the witness was once again out walking his dog and saw a star-like object flying at jet speed from the northwest to the southeast.  it then disappeared into light cloud cover.  in both of these sitings there was no sound nor were there any identification lights.  the time of the second siting was about the same as the may 1st siting. the witness called the field investigator immediately after the siting while walking home with his dog.

it should be noted that there is an airport close to rockwell collins and the witnesses daily walks with his dog have afforded many opportunities to watch aircraft of all types in the evening skies.
content.summary: Repeated sightings of star-like objects continue in the vicinity of rockwell collins, the world's leading aerospace and defense company.

content.detailedDescription: We were relaxing after dinner on the boats at the lake with 10-15 friends when someone asked what the orange light was just below the moon.  as we looked at the orange light it got brighter and brighter.  we were looking east and the object was moving from the south to the north just below the moon at around 10:00 pm.  as the object got closer you could see the red and orange get larger. (appeared to be flames from the front of the object)   at it's closest point it came to us, it looked like a light bulb through binoculars. in perspective for that night it was approx.  1/10th the size of the moon.  appeared to be well below 5,000 ft. and no sound.  before reaching the north horizon it faded away.  it crossed the night sky in approx.  3-4 minutes and very noticeable.
content.summary: Orange fireball shaped like a light bulb flaming, moving from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed and felt like a drive. it was around 4am in the morning... i decided to go to the warby ranges which is around 10 minutes from where i lived... as i was drivng out there i noticed a large light about 20 ft off the ground approximately.... i pulled the car over and got out.... i had the radio on and was looking at the light when the radio went off and that song from dj visage back in the early 80's ... we fade to grey came on the radio..... i got out of there quick smart... absolutley crapping myslef.... i really don't believe it meant me any harm but for some reason i was really scared maybe from the crap i have seen on the idiot box over extraterrestrials and ufo's so i have had a fear of ufo's ever snce and i truely believe deep down that if that was an alien craft it really didn't mean to hurt me in anyway....
content.summary: Large light in middle of paddock radio went dead and fade to grey came on radio.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i saw one yellow triangle with three lights traveling away from the point. right after we saw four red lights moving together. twenty min later we saw stars moving fast across the sky in all different directions five of them in fifteen min.
content.summary: We saw a yellow triangle after that  a red line of lites then star like moving across the sky in different directions five of them within twenty minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Moon of memphis ufo / a 1964 religious fatima

at 10pm around mid-november of 1964 in memphis tennessee, i was asked by my mother to take out the garbage. i went out back and i noticed a bright white full moon above. i looked closer and i noticed it had uniform whiteness with well define circular outline but i was not able to see the shades of white or grey that made the man in the moon face. it was equally as bright as the real full moon, bright enough to create a moon shadow. i looked around and i noticed another moon that was bright orange. this other moon was rising over our neighbor's house to the east, as i looked through the side yard from the back yard to the front. it had the features that created the man in the moon, so i believed that it was the real moon. i looked above and stared again at the white moon for a few minutes, then it made a rapid ascent in the sky. as it rose, it became smaller and smaller until it appeared to looked like a bright star, then a dim star, then disappeared into space. it reminded me of the star of bethleham when it was at high altitude.

i was only seven when i witnessed this ufo that i now call the moon of memphis. i had a good memory of the event so that when i was trained in the air force as a navigator, i was able to analyze the event better with my aviation experience. i estimate that the moon of memphis was at twenty thousand feet and was about ten acres in size. i developed this information from watching the ascent of the moon of memphis through some high cirrus clouds that i estimate was at sixty thousand feet. at twenty thousand feet it would have taken four 747 aircraft parked in a circle to cover the area of the moon of memphis ufo, thus creating a ten acre size estimate. when i saw it above me, it was exactly the size of the real moon when seen high in the sky.

i believe the moon of memphis ufo was a fatima from god. when you take a through z and match it with 1 through 26, you can add up the letters of a word and get a sum number. for example israel adds up to 64, which made me think that the 1664 moon of memphis ufo had religious significance. where the moon of memphis came from or how it was created, was certainly a unique phenomenon of divine origin and purpose. it's appearance in 1964 hints that it had a  religious intellectual mind.

from voices, visions, and dreams that i experienced thirty three years later, i believe it had a message from god to humanity. god wanted humanity to be more reverent to all living beings and animals. the consciousness of each being or animal is precious and must be respected more. before animals are killed, they should receive anesthesia and be put into an unwakeable sleep. anything less is cruel, heartless, and unreverent to that being and god. humanity should find a way to eat without killing animals, but until then, we must not kill an animal while it is awake. treat innocent animals as you would like to be treated if you were in their place. the moon of memphis is proof that god does exist and we should obey his wish for us to be more kind to each living being and animals.

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: A ufo called the moon of memphis is a fatima of god.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside feeding the dogs. the sun had just gone down and it was beggining to get dark. i had opened a dogs cage and dumped some food in a bowl. once i closed the pen i had turned to pick up the water buket when some big, orange bright shpere shaped light caught my attention. i looked up just to catch the bright light dart behind the woods. the light was about a mile away from me but was still probably on the fenceline of my property. once the light disapeared everything was okwardly dark again. once i looked away from the woods i had noticed that i was very shaky. and suprised. i didnt know what to think exactly all though i had always been curious about ufos. i wasint quite sure what to call it. i never really told anyone. also i had talked to some freinds that live in a nearby town and they had also said they experienced something kind of like this on new years night. they had seen and heard something crash while riding their bikes they said they heard it hit the ground. the next day one of them went back to the place and had found a big imprint in the ground.
content.summary: Big orange sphere shape darted behind the woods.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving by a wheat field this morning and saw what appeared to be a crop circle. my boyfriend pointed out that the wheat was flattened in various areas of the field. as he said this, i looked out the right side of my window and noticed a perfect disc shaped depression in the wheat. we didn't have time to stop and investigate as we were on a time deadline before he had to go to work. i really only saw these crop circles and designs with a passing glimpse, but it definitely caught our attention. we live around tons of wheat fields and have never noticed anything like that before. i wish someone would investigate or take a flight over the field to see if there is any sort of overall design. it might be explained in a natural way...We've had a lot of storms around here lately, but the disc like depression in the wheat is odd.
content.summary: My boyfriend and i were driving by a wheat field this morning and saw what appeared to be a crop circle.

content.detailedDescription: In the last saturday i made many the photographs of an not identified flying object, in the street in front of my house, i i observed approximately per 20 minutes, then i caught my camera, a sony dsc-h7 with zoom 15x ���tico, but i needed to use zoom ���tico agreed with zoom digital, resulting in 76x of zoom. the naked eyes, the object is white, and makes a random pulse, but in the photos the color is gray brilliant. i really do not know what he is this, and am made use to discover what he is.
content.summary: The object was very high up, i did use 76x zoom to capture the pictures.

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the sighting, i was in my backyard. before hand, i was searching for my brother within the house, but i could not find him. i decided to peak outside into my backyard through the back door. simultaneously, i thought to myself, "what a clear night to hunt for ufo's... nah maybe tomorrow night"; i have always been an ufo fanatic. seconds later, i heard the loud sound of metal clinging and a thump of weights falling when i saw my brother running to the house and calling my name to alert me that there was something weird in the sky. i ran outside with adrenalin pumping through my veins, hoping it was a sighting. to my surprise, it was a very bright like object similar to a star, jupiter perhaps. it drifted across the sky slowly and directly above our heads towards the northeast. immediately i believed it was an ufo because the star did not have blue or red, or other blinking lights of any sort, which are found on identified aircraft, and it did not make a sound at all. the object must've traveled no faster than a normal boeing 737 plane that southwest airlines uses to fly its civilians, for the object was only visible for about 3 minutes before it disappeared behind some trees and houses. aside from getting an adrenalin rush, i felt sort of frightened but excited all at the same time. several seconds after i saw the object, i ran inside my house to grab my phone, so that i can call and report the sighting to a small ufo store in sedona, arizona; however, it was already late and no one answered my call. unfortunately, i was not able to document the sighting media-wise as proof, as the camera on my phone has very poor quality and did not pick up the light emitted by the object.
content.summary: The object was bright in the night sky as if it were a star slowly drifting across the sky without a sound.

content.detailedDescription:
1. after watching a program on fractal geometry , i've switched tv program but cannot now recall of what it was about as i begun to suddenly have a tension headache , so i was just was lying on the sofa , but my neck & head pain was getting worse plus i was getting chills, so i decided to go & close the window.
 2. as i closed shut the window i haven't noticed anything & was about to go to the other window to close that one as well, when suddenly i've turned on my heel & wend back to the 1st window & gazed up into the night sky. and all of a sudden the 1st ship manifested it self , at that point i thought it was my fever but a 2nd one appeared & then a 3rd one above those two !
 3. at that point it was obvious it was them , i smiled & said " hi guys" , at which point the lights started flushing together rhythmically , (perhaps some kind of morse code signal ?). i stood there for about 6 or 7 min. thought of photographing the ships but to be honest didn't think the photos would turn out as it was night time. even though they were still stationary in the sky i left the window , glanced at the clock & it was 3:01 am, i took a sip of water , than sat down on the sofa staring at tv & pondering this event as well weather i'll feel better by the morning as i wanted to go to the protest. as i was thinking this my tv went off ! i was stunned & took this as a 'no' sign. tv stayed off for about 2 min. so just as i got up to go & look again if the ships were still there the tv turned itself back on , lol ! & yes they were still there so i've watch them for about 4 min. & after i left. approximately 20 min. after that i went back to see if they still hover there but no , all 3 ships were gone.
 4. at first it seemed as if white vapor & than the clear outline shape was visible & actually for brief moment a windows like could be seen , then the lights came on . some were white, blue & one golden color . the full moon above & to the side of these really nicely illuminated them.
 5. as i've said already i wasn't feeling well & neither later or the whole saturday i spent in bed feverish (so i was prevented of going to the protest after all) , only late sunday i started feeling well again. 6. as i've mentioned i walked away from the window so i did not see them leave .
i'm attaching a quick sketch of this sighting & yes they were as big as i drew them compared to the the windows of that building .
content.summary: 3 large ufos in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on interstate 70 near w florissant ave when something in the northeast sky caught my eye.  the object looked like a cigar and its altitude seemed low.  its color blended in with the background clouds as white or grey.  the movement of the object was not strange as it was level and straight during the entire sighting.  what stood out is the speed at which it was traveling and its low altitude.  i don't have a good feel for how far away the object was but it was definitely on the illinois side of the mississippi river below the intermittent cloud cover.  i watched it cross about 120 degrees of the horizon in approximately 110 seconds, moving from nne to ssw until it faded into the background clouds behind the st. louis skyline.  that is a speed of about 1 degree of sky covered per second so i rolled down my windows while trying to keep the object in view and did not hear a sonic boom.  there is a lot of air traffic in that area that i see every day (landings/takeoffs at lambert and st. louis city airport), and this object certainly stood out due to the speed, altitude, and heading (all the airports in the area are nw/se runways and flyovers are much higher).  as soon as i lost sight of the object i sent a text to my wife and the time of that text is 2:44pm cdt.
content.summary: Light colored, low flying cigar, crosses majority of horizon in less than 2 min.

content.detailedDescription:
We were standing on our back deck facing west & taking pictures of the sky,we didn't notice the object until we looked at the pictures & decided to send it to you for your opinion.Approximatly 2 weeks before this around 1 in the afternoon i saw 2 silver objects darting above the house-along ways in the sky,they looked like small dots, but were moving up,down & darting back & forth for 2-3 minutes before they disappeared,i told my wife when she got home that i had saw a ufo & now this picture... she's starting to believe too.Anyway,take a look please & let me know what you think,you'll see a vertical cigar shaped object(reflection?)in the middle of the picture.
thanks,*(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: We never saw it until we looked at the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Three objects were observed, each one separately.  they all followed similar flight patterns.  they were sighted initially in the west out of our window in the tv room.  we were watching the tv.  i jumped up and grabbed my camera and went outside.  my wife followed me outside.

they moved from west to east and became stationary at what appeared to us to be southwest of our position.  each object then appeared to climb in altitude slowly until disappearing out of sight.  there were no discernible clouds in the sky although when the objects disappeared we both had the feeling they went into a cloud.

i took still pictures and some moving pictures throughout the event.  time and date are stamped on each frame.  at one point i took a photo of what i thought was one object only to discover when i imported it into the computer that there were three objects in the frame.

the was no sound associated with their movement.  all three objects appeared as candlelight type of color, a mix of reds, oranges, white.  i noticed a bit of pulsing, especially in the white aspects of the objects.

after the first object disappeared, an airplane came into view moving from the southwest to the northeast.  it was much lower in the sky than the object was at any given point.  but i remember shaking my head wondering if the pilot could have possibly not seen the object!

the second object appeared before i got into the house after the first one disappeared.  the third object was noticed after we got back in the house after the second object had disappeared.
content.summary: Three independent objects move from west to east then climb out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello everyone. i came here the first time explaining the story how me and my family chased the ufo and i took those two disappointing photos. i will still remember that event however now i got some video of another sighting except this one wasn't superb like the first one, though i am sure i captured another ufo. this one is quite different as it appeared as a typical ufo that you see on youtube.

this looks like a classic ufo to me and if you look closely it appears that the ufo sways back and forth. look at it a couple times after the edit than you will see what i am talking about.

it is also heavily edited the reason why is because it was so bright outside that i couldn't see my lcd screen so it was hard to tell if i was capturing or not and i couldn't locate it perfectly until the last bit of the edit part of the video.

when i lost it i thought that the object bolted but it appeared to go beneath the tree in my field of view and disappeared from my site. 

i should of checked it out closely by driving towards it if i could find it however i had to get ready to go to college that day and didn't have the time. so i wasn't really ready. next time i plan to film it better and go full force and try to film the whole thing until i cannot see it.

this is my second sighting of my life. if i had this camera before hand the first sighting would of been incredible.

so i believe that something will happen soon and i want everyone to know that something out there exist.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My second encounter with video.

content.detailedDescription:
*info deleted--see comments--sgonzalez/cms.

i wish to remain anonymous.
 
last night at 330am on the way home from work, driving route 1 ( mopac ) northbound to hwy183, i spotted a trinagle ufo above camp mabry.
 
i first noticed a bright stationary light as i entered the highway ( mopac route 1 ), skepticaly i dismissed as airplane. it did not seem to move though and remained stationary.
 
as i approached the camp mabry area off of route 1, i began to pass under the object.  i slowed down to 40 mph and stuck my head out the window.
 
the object appeared to be hovering still at commercial jet heighth. i took 3 looks, each time squinting my eyes and taking double checks.
 
it was roughly the size of a 10 cent dime if you eld it over your head arms stretched out.
 
3 lights on each corner.
 
it was dark grey.
 
very small. but distinct triangle shape.
 
2 of the lights at base remained lit, bright white circles. the rear ??? light, or top light, blinked as an  airplanes would.
 
what struck me odd about this was the brightness of object. i am hoping more poeple witnessed this event in austin above camp mabry.
 
until then i wish to remain anonymous. 
 
due to the fact that this is my second sighting and i dont think posting about it online without pictures will do any good in the long run.
 
my first sighting was almost 1 yr ago to date. while riding in a neighbor hood street behind camp mabry on the other side of route 1 mopac. about 35th street and exposition blvd.
 
i  immdeiatly dismissed this sighting because it happened so quick.  the first sighting was so low to the ground i didnt believe my eyes. a solid grey triangle that almost blended into the clouds passed over the base at a quick rate of speed ( 100mph?) silently. i saw it for 3 seconds. then it disapeared into the overcast sky's. i did not want to believe what i saw. and nobody else was reporting these sightings, so naturally i thought my imagination got the best of me.
 
last night, saturday morning 33o am the 26th of june, was not overcast, it was a full moon, the skys did have some clouds from the weather south of austin. but the sky was clear when i saw this nights sighting.
 
i do not know what this email will achieve unless you receive simular reports from this night. it was at 330am. i do not drink. i work at a bar. i am sober. 5 yrs plus. most poeple at that hour are drunk. austin night life.
 
someone in aviation had to see that thing. there is spicewood airfeild to the north west. bergstrom airport to the south east. 
 
the thing that struck me the most was the distinct triangle shape. 
 
there was no light in the center.
 
just 3 white lights. 2 lit. 1 blinking.
 
ctarider
i wish to remain
anonymous
content.summary: Very small. but distinct triangle shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back deck, which essentially faces west. it was around 8:30 and i was enjoying the evening air and watching the stars come out. i was also enjoying a good cigar and a scotch. i'm in the sierra foothills at about 3500'.

from the west came a bright light moving briskly. not super fast, but probably faster than a typical piston engine aircraft. it was twilight and a few stars were starting to become visible. this object was a bright light and i could see no other "parts".  it was moving eastward and made no sound. there were no blinking lights and i could see nothing that would indicate an airplane of any sort. it disappeared behind the trees after about 8 seconds so i moved to the front of the house (east). it reappeared from behind the trees and continued on eastward. the light were definitely not a landing light. it remained the same brightness as it approached and as it left. there are no airports in this area. i would guess the altitude to be somewhere between 2000 and 4000 feet.  the neighborhood was pretty quiet and i heard not sound whatsoever. that is why i decided to file this report. 

the included picture was taken earlier this month during the day. i tried to make it look like twilight, while showing the size of the light. the bottom of the picture is west-southwest. the top left is east-northeast.

i did not see a "disk" shape. just a very bright white light.
content.summary: Bright light moving briskly from west to east. no sound or flashing wing lights.

content.detailedDescription: Just happened to be outside on the phone. i looked up and noticed a white light in the sky moving at a good speed that i could tell was something different. the first one moved directly north before the light slowly faded out. i don't think it faded because of distance. after telling my friend on the phone looked up again and saw a similar object moving faster heading north east. lost sight of it after a couple of minutes....
content.summary: Star like white light.

content.detailedDescription: Eu corro quase todos os dias em s���o paulo, minha cidade. quando cheguei ��� rua onde moro, avistei no c���u, a uns 40 graus, um ponto vermelho movmentando-se no c���u. vinha da dire������o noroeste e ia para a dire������o sudoeste. passou por sobre venus, creio, que ��� a estrela mais clera e forte que aparece no c���u no in���cio da noite e fica a 40 graus leste. neste hor���rio das 18:30 hs. imediatamente parei a corrida para observar detalhadamente o objeto, e chamei uma vizinha que n���o conhe���o para confirmar a observa������o. ela perguntou-me o que era. dise-lhe que para mim era um mist���rio, e que das outras vezes que vi objetos com a cor vermelha aconteceram coisas fortes como insucessos e enfermidades. ela assustou-se, e decidi continuar a correr, mas observando o objeto. ao chegar em meu pr���dio, decidi ficar fora e continuar observando o objeto, que mantinha seu trajeto at��� parar, ou ir em uma dire������o que n���o me permitia ver movimento. como o objeto n���o saia mais do lugar, cansei-me de ficar observando e entrei em casa. este m���s de junho em s���o paulo aparecem  . bal���es, mas, confesso que era diferente do que julgo ser um bal���o.
content.summary: Red point seemed a star  going and stoping  in diferents times.

content.detailedDescription: Thougt it was a satelite at first,but it stopped in the sky for about 3minutes long enough to wake my wife and have her see it allso, then it just shot of and out of sight,totally uncharecteristic of any satelites i have observed at nite.
content.summary: Star like object that came across the sky like a sattelite, stopped for 3 minutes and took off again.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10:30, i was walking back to my house after locking up our trailer when i saw a bright light in the sky. it immediately caught my eye because it was very bright, but appeared--at first--stationary in the sky. it also had no blinking lights like a plane. at first i thought it might be satellite, but i've seen the space station pass by before, and this was not moving across the sky. it was a round ball shape, bright, mostly white but with a reddish/orange hue. it moved slightly, but not in one direction. i went inside to get my wife, and we both saw it, smaller now, but in the same area. we both quickly recognized that it was not a plane, or a fireball, or a satellite. couldn't explain it's movement.
we looked on the star chart, and it appeared in the area of the constellation bootes.  it was to the south of the lesser star on the right side of arcturus, moving to the south.  it then moved north, passing that star and drawing near coma berenices.  it then turned west, then north again, getting smaller all the time, before finally hooking around to the west (but keeping in the general area of bootes) and disappearing at about 10:35.  
we heard no sound at all the entire time.  
when it first appeared, it looked about the same size as a bb held at arm's length, was about the size of a pinhead at arms length when my wife came out, stayed that approximate size for a minute or two,  and then got progressively smaller until it disappeared. it had a definite round shape, bright but self-contained.  the light was mostly continuous, but just before it disappeared, it seemed to pulsate a little, although we didn't notice a particular pattern.  it was rather like an ember going out, and we had the impression that it was getting further away.  there were no clouds.
content.summary: Bright light over yamhill county, or; appeared high in the sky around bootes constellation, then disappeared.
